rules.title: TERALOGIC - RULES

general_behavior.title: §1. General Behavior
rules: **Be respectful:** Treat others kindly. No insults or discrimination.
**No advertising:** Only promote in designated channels.
**No spam:** Avoid sending repetitive messages, emojis, or irrelevant links.
**No personal attacks:** Keep discussions respectful and on-topic.

support.title: §2. Support
rules: **Ask clear questions:** Provide enough detail for troubleshooting (error messages, screenshots, etc.).
**Use the correct channel:** Post questions in relevant channels (**#bug-reports**).
**Provide detailed bug reports:** Include all necessary information (bot name, steps to reproduce, error messages).
**Follow Discord’s Terms of Service:** Do not misuse bots or violate Discord rules.

channel_usage.title: §3. Channel Usage
rules: **No cross-posting:** Avoid posting the same content in multiple channels.

privacy_security.title: §4. Privacy & Security
rules: **No personal info sharing:** Don’t share sensitive details (passwords, emails, etc.).
**Stay safe:** Avoid clicking on suspicious links.

violations.title: §5. Violations
rules: **Penalties:** Breaking the rules can lead to warnings, temporary bans, or permanent bans.
**Reports:** Report violations to moderators via our ticket system.

rules.footer: Enjoy your time and thank you for following the rules!
